desc: A large crystal of electric energy left by a Thunder Revenant. A valuable material used in crafting.
lore:
A large crystal occasionally left behind by a Thunder Revenant. Electricity leaps across its golden surface, making it a significant hazard to lab equipment. Contains a substantial amount of energy that makes it a valuable material in crafting.

Research suggests that these crystals are formed when energy solidifies within the core of a Revenant. Crackling bolts of lightning coalesce in arcing streaks within it, bringing to mind powerful storms.
name: Storm Omphalos
